name: In the Far Future, Where I Belong
name_original: In the Far Future, Where I Belong
description:
This was created as a virtual counter part to the art exhibition "In the Far Future Where I Belong".

I wouldn't describe it as a game exactly, as there are no rules. My first foray into serious coding, it is an attempt to create an accessible, atmospheric environment.

There's not too much to do, but it's pretty, I think.

Sound is essential!

You can find the website here:

www.inthefarfuture.com

Coded by Daniel Bandfield in webGL, with models created by Robin Leverton and paintings by Louis Judkins.

www.danielbandfield.com
